overview: On the back staircases of a residential building, girls smoke hidden from their parents. They take off their clothes to prevent being denounced by the smell of smoke. Cora is 30 years old. She lives in the same building as the girls, and is stuck in an unhappy marriage. The woman catches the girls smoking. From then on, she begins her path towards freedom.

production_companies.name: Escola de Comunicações e Artes, Universidade de São Paulo

title: Espalhadas Pelo Ar
